text: Grand Chancellor may refer to: * Grand Chancellor, a senior governmental post under an emperor, monarch or president * Grand Chancellor (education), a leader of a college or university * Grand Chancellor of the Crown, one of the highest officials in historic Poland * Grand Chancellor of Denmark, a historic Danish title * Hotel Grand Chancellor, a hotel chain in Australia and New Zealand == See also == * Archchancellor or chief chancellor, a title given to the highest dignitary of the Holy Roman Empire
title: Grand Chancellor
